thread.title: Video: Man saves elderly woman from oncoming train

author: Mari A. Schaefer
title: Video: Man saves elderly woman from oncoming train
text:
Video: Man saves elderly woman from oncoming train Updated: March 9, 2017 — 3:20 PM EST 133 Share 
Mari A. Schaefer works for the Inquirer. More by Mari A. Schaefer 
Saddle Brook railroad crossing in Bergen County on Wednesday when he spotted the woman walking with two canes as the crossing lights began to flash and the NJ Transit train sounded its horn, ABC7 reported.

Eyewitness News (@ABC7NY) March 9, 2017
